item.title: History of the colony of Natal, South Africa. To which is added, an appendix, containing a brief history of the Orange-River sovereignty and of the various races inhabiting it, the great lake N'gami, commandoes of the Dutch Boers, &c., &c
item.scopeAndContent: [Source - Benathi Marufu for FHYA, 2020: A digital copy of the book History of the colony of Natal, South Africa: to which is added, an appendix, containing a brief history of the Orange-River sovereignty and of the various races inhabiting it, the great lake N'gami, commandoes of the Dutch Boers, &c., &c. by William C. Holden. London: Alexander Heylin, 1855.]
